post.description: Create a consumer for JSON data, starting at the beginning of the topic's log. The consumer group is called "my_json_consumer" and the instance is "my_consumer_instance".

post.summary: Subscribe the consumer to a topic
post.description: Subscribe the consumer to a topic.No content in response

get.description: consume some data from a topic using the base URL in the first response.

delete.description: Finally, close the consumer with a DELETE to make it leave the group and clean up its resources.No content in response
